name: ADJWGT_CAT
description: Categories used to adjust initial design weight (WGT) to account for use of over sample lakes.

name: ALBERS_X
description: x-coordinate from Albers projection (meters)

name: ALBERS_Y
description: y-coordinate from Albers projection (meters)

name: AQUACULTUR
description: Lake is a a private aquaculture waterbody (YES). Derived from Lake evaluation desktop and field forms. Used with other information to construct LAKE_SAMP

name: AREA_CAT7
description: Lake area unequal probability category (7 categories)

name: AREA_HA
description: Lake polygon area (hectares) from NHD

name: CNTYNAME
description: County name

name: COM_ID
description: Unique NHD 10-digit common identifier code (0=code not assigned in NHDPlus)

name: COMMENT_INFO
description: Comments and flag explanations for lake info data

name: DATE_COL
description: Date Sample Collected

name: DEPTH_X
description: Lake Depth (m) at Index Site

name: DEPTHMAX
description: Maximum Observed Lake Depth (m)

name: DISPOSAL
description: Lake is used for disposal (tailings, mine-tailings, etc.) (YES). Derived from Lake evaluation desktop and field forms. Used with other information to construct LAKE_SAMP

name: DSGN_CAT
description: Probability survey design categories used to assign unequal probability of selection

name: ECO_L3_NAM
description: Omernik level 3 ecoregion name

name: ECO_LEV_3
description: Omernik level 3 ecoregion number

name: ECO_NUTA
description: NLA Aggregate Nutrient Ecoregion

name: ECO3_X_ORIGIN
description: WSA_ECO3 x LAKE_ORIGIN CLASS

name: ELEV_PT
description: Site elevation (meters) from the National Elevation Dataset

name: EPA_REG
description: EPA Region

name: EVAPORATE
description: Lake is used for evaporation (YES). Derived from Lake evaluation desktop and field forms. Used with other information to construct LAKE_SAMP

name: FID_1
description: GIS record number for site-visit combination

name: FLAG_INFO
description: Data qualifier flag for lake info data

name: FLD_FLAG
description: Not NHD Lake-reference lake not found in NHD. Not in NHD lake polygon-field location was not found in NHD lake polygon

name: FLD_LAT_DD
description: Latitude (decimal degrees) recorded from the field form (lake verification)

name: FLD_LON_DD
description: Longitude (decimal degrees) recorded from the field form (lake verification)

name: FLD_SRC
description: Field location source: Index_Site: location where index sample was taken. Launch_Site: point where boat was launched. Map_Loc: Location obtained from design file.  Priority:  lake index site; then launch site, then map location

name: HUC_2
description: Hydrologic region (2-digit)

name: HUC_8
description: Hydrologic region (8-digit)

name: INDEX_SAMP
description: Confirmation that lake was sampled. Secchi_Samp-Secchi depth determined

name: INDXSAMP_CHEM
description: Index chhemistry sample for site (YES/NO)-typically the Visit 1 Primary sample

name: INDXSAMP_CHLA
description: Index chlorophyll sample for site (YES/NO)-typically the Visit 1 Primary sample

name: INDXSAMP_CORE
description: Index sediment core sample for site (YES/NO)-typically the Visit 1 Primary sample

name: INDXSAMP_ENTE
description: Index enterococci sample for site (YES/NO)-typically the Visit 1 Primary sample

name: INDXSAMP_INF
description: Index sample for site (YES/NO); typically visit 1)

name: INDXSAMP_MICR
description: Index microcystin sample for site (YES/NO)-typically the Visit 1 Primary sample

name: INDXSAMP_PHAB
description: Index sample for physical habitat (YES/NO)?

name: INDXSAMP_PHYT
description: Index phytoplankton sample for site (YES/NO)-typically the Visit 1 Primary sample

name: INDXSAMP_SDHG
description: Index sediment Hg sample for site (YES/NO)-typically the Visit 1 Primary sample

name: INDXSAMP_ZOOP
description: Index zooplankton sample for site (YES/NO)-typically the VIsit 1 Primary sample

name: LAKE_ORIGIN
description: Lake origin (MAN-MADE, NATURAL [which includes natural lakes augmented by dams])

name: LAKE_SAMP
description: Eval. status. _Denied (access denied). _Inaccess (physically inaccessible). _Other. _LT_4ha (< 4ha). _Shallow (< 1m deep). _Vegetated (< 1000 m2 open H2O). _Saline (tidal). Special_Purpose (aquacult., disposal, WWT, or evap.). Not_Lake (other)

name: LAKEAREA
description: Lake polygon area (km^2) from NHD

name: LAKENAME
description: Lake name (from field forms)

name: LAKEPERIM
description: Lake polygon perimeter (km) from NHD

name: LAT_DD
description: Latitude (decimal degrees) obtained from NHD (NAD83)

name: LON_DD
description: Longitude (decimal degrees) obtained from NHD (NAD83)

name: MDCATY
description: Unequal selection probability for lake

name: METER_DEEP
description: Lake is > 1 m deep (YES). Derived from Lake evaluation desktop and field forms. Used with other information to construct LAKE_SAMP

name: NESLAKE
description: NESLake-Lake was included in 1970s National Eutrophication Survey

name: NESLAKE_ID
description: NESLake-Lake was included in 1970s National Eutrophication Survey

name: NHDNAME
description: Lake name (from NHD)

name: NON_SALINE
description: Lake is non-saline waterbody (YES). Derived from Lake evaluation desktop and field forms. Used with other information to construct LAKE_SAMP

name: NUT_REG
description: Nutrient ecoregion, based on EPA nutrient criteria documents for lakes & reservoirs)

name: NUTREG_NAME
description: Nutrient ecoregion name

name: OPEN_WATER
description: Lake has > 1000 m2 of open water (YES). Derived from Lake evaluation desktop and field forms. Used with other information to construct LAKE_SAMP

name: PANEL
description: Panel_1-lake was included in base design. OverSamp-Lake was part of over sample of lakes used for replacing lakes in base design if they could not be sampled

name: PERM_WATER
description: Lake is a permanent waterbody (YES). Derived from Lake evaluation desktop and field forms. Used with other information to construct LAKE_SAMP

name: PHYS_ACCES
description: Lake is physically accessible for crew and boats (YES). Derived from Lake evaluation desktop and field forms. Used with other information to construct LAKE_SAMP

name: REACHCODE
description: Unique NHD 14-digit Reach Code (0=code not assigned in NHDPlus

name: REF_CLUSTER
description: NLA Reference Site Cluster (A-G)

name: REF_NUTR
description: Nutrient Least Disturbed Reference Site (Y/N)

name: REFCLUS_NAME
description: NLA Reference Cluster Description

name: REPEAT
description: Repeat visit lake (YES/blank)

name: RT_NLA
description: NLA Reference Class Assignment (REF=reference, SO-SO=intermediate, TRASH=impacted)

name: SAMPLED
description: Site Sampled Code

name: SAMPLED_ASSESS
description: Site Sample Status - Assessment Form

name: SAMPLED_CHEM
description: Index chemistry sample for site (YES/NO)-typically the Visit 1 Primary sample

name: SAMPLED_CHLA
description: CHLA SAMPLE COLLECTED/ANALYZED?

name: SAMPLED_CORE
description: Sediment core sample collected?

name: SAMPLED_ENTE
description: Enterococci sample collected?

name: SAMPLED_INF
description: Sediment core samples (Top, Bottom) used for diatom-inferred chemistry?

name: SAMPLED_MICR
description: Microcystin sample collected?

name: SAMPLED_PHAB
description: Site sampled code for physical habitat characterization

name: SAMPLED_PHYT
description: Phytoplankton sample collected?

name: SAMPLED_PROFILE
description: SAMPLED variable from profile data

name: SAMPLED_SDHG
description: Sediment Hg sample collected?

name: SAMPLED_SECCHI
description: Secchi Depth Site Sample Status

name: SAMPLED_ZOOP
description: Zooplankton sample collected?

name: SEWAGE
description: Lake is sewage treatment pond (YES). Derived from Lake evaluation desktop and field forms. Used with other information to to construct LAKE_SAMP

name: SITE_ID
description: ID Assigned to Each Site

name: SITE_TYPE
description: PROB_Samp: Lake is from probability sample and can be used for population estimation.  REF_Lake: Lake is not from probability sample and was selected as a candidate reference lake

name: SIZE_CLASS
description: Lake area size class

name: SLD
description: Shoreline development index (=LAKEPERIM/(2*sqrt(LAKEAREA*pi))

name: SRFC_AREA
description: Lake is > 4 ha (YES). Derived from Lake evaluation desktop and field forms. Used with other information to construct LAKE_SAMP.

name: ST
description: State two letter code

name: STATE_NAME
description: STATE_NAME

name: STATUS_DSK
description: Lake evaluation status from lake evaluation desktop form.Used with other information to construct LAKE_SAMP

name: STATUS_FLD
description: Lake evaluation status from lake evaluation field form. Used with other information to construct LAKE_SAMP

name: STATUS_VER
description: Lake evaluation status from lake verification form. Used with other information to construct LAKE_SAMP

name: STRATUM
description: Probability survey design stratum. NLALake is single stratum

name: TNT
description: Target:Non-target evaluation status derived from LAKE_SAMP

name: URBAN
description: URBAN LAKE? (YES/NO)

name: VISIT_ID
description: Number assigned to each visit

name: VISIT_NO
description: Sequential Visit Number Within Year

name: WGT
description: Initial site weight based on base design. DO NOT USE for population estimation

name: WGT_NLA
description: Adjusted site weight. USE for population estimation

name: WSA_ECO3
description: Wadeable Stream Assessment three aggregrated Omernik level 3 ecoregions

name: WSA_ECO9
description: Wadeable Stream Assessment nine aggregrated Omernik level 3 ecoregions
